mapper.insert: insert into user (id, password, name, email, tel, salt) values (#{id}, sha2(concat(#{password}, #{salt}), 256), #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{salt})
mapper.update: update user set password=sha2(concat(#{password}, #{salt}), 256), name=#{name}, email=#{email}, tel=#{tel}, salt=#{salt} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from user where id = #{id} and password = sha2(concat(#{password}, (select salt from user where id = #{id})), 256)
select count(id) from user where id = #{id} and password = sha2(concat(#{password}, (select salt from user where id = #{id})), 256)
